data.title: Cool looking bar
data.text: I loved the atmosphere in the bar it was unique yet trendy.  Nice place to relax and have a drink while catching up with others.

data.title: Great lounge which on most nights is a place you can have a conversation
data.text: Nice setting, decent prices, and a place you can usually have a conversation. Rarely is there a loud, crowd making conversation difficult

data.title: Downtown Orlando's Best Kept Secret
data.text: Amidst all the hustle and bustle of downtown Orlando's nightlife, sits the Bosendorfer Lounge. Every time we go here, it's not very crowded. Why, I have no idea. The drinks are excellent and detailed, the atmosphere is gorgeous, and the music is great. I've also had lunch here many times and it's a great alternative to the often crowded downtown spots.

data.title: Very posh lounge and the menu was delicious!
data.text: So this is the bar at the Grand Boheme and we ended up eating lunch here everyday during our 3 day stay. The menu is also much larger because you can order form the dinner menu to the lounge. It was also a perfect place for drinks before we went out at night. The pricing was moderate and about the same as all all the other bars we visited in Downtown Orlando.

data.title: Still Great After the Acquisition
data.text: The lounge in the Grand Bohemian Hotel was a favorite before the Bohemian was acquired by a chain. I avoid the hotel now but he lounge is still wonderful. We stopped there for a small meal before an engagement. Our server, Paris, was vivacious and knowledgeable. The beef carpaccio was superb and the house Cabernet was surprising robust.

data.title: Great Bloody Mary's!
data.text: It may seem there is not enough seating in the lounge area when there are particular events going on during the weekends.  The drinks are expensive but worth it.  Bartenders are friendly and courteous too.

data.title: Beautifully decorated bar and excellent staff
data.text: We stayed inside the Grand Bohemian Hotel and this bar was inside the hotel. Super Awesome decor! Drinks were really good too!

data.title: Wonderful atmosphere, spectacular food and drinks and great service!
data.text: My boyfriend and I stayed at the Grand Bohemian hotel for father’s day weekend and I must say it surpassed our expectations. We had some drinks and some appetizers at the Bösendorfer Lounge the night we got there, there was an awesome jazz band playing while we sipped on our fabulous drinks (My favorite was the Cloud 9 a wonderful floral and light Lychee infused Vodka drink).

data.title: Great for drinks and apps!
data.text: The bar here is wonderful. We stopped in before heading back up to the room for a cheese and meat platter and a couple of cocktails. Probably the best selection of meats and cheeses (and pate too!) that I had seen in a while. Great nighttime spot!

data.title: Superb! Tough to compare.
data.text:
Delicious beverages served by attentive bartenders in an atmosphere that is certain to dazzle even the pickiest guests. It truly is that nice, and because of that you should anticipate and understand a higher price point that other average lounges in the area (and downtown Orlando is FULL of them).
Treat yourself to something special and visit this exquisite location. Enjoy!!

data.title: Intimate atmosphere, great service
data.text: Love the intimate decor & piano bar! Busy but service was excellent. Food is awesome. Worth the price.

data.title: Very few places compare with the Bosendorfer Lounge in downtown ORlando.
data.text: If you are going to for coming from an event at the Amway Center or (more recently) the Dr Phillips Center for the Performing Arts then you MUST stop in for Drinks and Food at the Lounge, within the BOHEMIAN hotel on Orange Ave.  The food and drinks are EXCELLENT all around.  So friendly is the staff that you can be there for hours talking and not even know it.  Try their mushroom pizza!  Try everything.  The drinks are top notch as is the professionalism of the wait staff.  NOT TO BE MISSED is the nightly playing of the BOSENDORFER GRAND PIANO just outside the lounge at the entrance.  There are only two of these monster grands in the world.  One is still in Germany and the other?  Right there in Sunny Orlando.  Love great piano playing on a great piano.  Your Must try it...

data.title: Come for the piano music
data.text: Came for the piano music, but loved the martinis and the smelt appetizer!  The Bosendorfer grand piano has spectacular sound, especially in the round setting of the lounge.

data.title: Upscale grown up bar
data.text: We stopped off before heading to the room for the night.   Sat at the bar and the bartender was delightful and attentive.   We had four drinks and it was about $60 so be prepared to pay.   Live jazz band and amazing piano which we heard was only one of two of its type in the world.  Upscale scene I would say geared towards couples.

data.title: Excellent Jazz!!
data.text: We stopped to check out the Bosendorfer Lounge at the Bohemian Hotel. The piano was amazing part of the trio!! Live music is always the best.  Beautiful atmosphere and a cozy place to be!

data.title: Food is Great, Hate the TVs, Slow Service
data.text: We checked into the hotel and came down for a late dinner, looking for a quiet, romantic time after a day of travel. However, the TVs over the bar and the cheering gang at the bar reminded more of Joe's sports bar than a first class hotel bar and restaurant. We ordered pizza and a couple glasses of wine, and all was good with those. Service was a bit "casual" as it appeared only one girl was taking care of the entire room, and she was a bit friendly with one guy, spending a lot of time talking with him. Despite all that, it was a pleasant visit and we'd come back in if we stay here again.

data.title: Good Drinks, Poor Service
data.text: We hung out at the lounge while we waited for our rooms to become available. We sat for probably 15 minutes and no one came to help us. I finally went to the bartender and asked for service and he sent someone over. The drinks were good. Nothing to write home about, but good.

data.title: Poor service, not recommended
data.text:
I came late on a weekday to check it out based on reviews of a cool, upscale atmosphere. What a letdown. There was no live music, understandable on a weekday night. Place was nearly empty with only one table of guests. Three bartenders were rushing around, busy doing something. It seemed odd, considering how quiet it was.
  So I got a beer at the bar. It was served in a warm glass, making the beer room temperature. Ridiculous. I brought it to their attention, and got a slighter colder one. Then I ordered an appetizer, which was dropped in front of me without silverware or a napkin. These mistakes are so basic and amateur, i can only assume they just didn't care. Maybe the level of service is proportionate to the amount of your check? Really unimpressed, and I doubt I'll be returning, nor will my friends.

data.title: Nice piano bar, nice environment , but always served with an attitude.
data.text: We have been here many times over the years. Great piano bar with great atmosphere. However, the last few times we were here it seemed that the service staff had attitudes.  Last time was a very busy night. I understand having a hard night at work. However not only was service horrible ( it took 45 minutes to get our drinks!), but I was charged twice the girl apparently charged me for someone else's table too. It took me many phone calls to the Bohiem accounting department and several months before they pulled the ticket and verified it was NOT my signature.   Have not been back since

data.title: Great Atmosphere
data.text: After a night out before heading back to the room we stopped in for a nite cap.  Ended up staying for hours listening to the live music it was a extra bonus to a great evening.
